name: Steve Burgess
text: Family run business that takes pride in there work , the bed liner turned out great , going back to get a bed cover next week, oh yea I drove a hour to get there and passed by several places that could have done this job , I’ve had 2 trucks spayed by them and most importantly Brandon thanked me for driving all that way to have them do the job, it’s important that people care about their  customers and future business! Thanks for the great work

name: Anthony Schneider
text: I had Troy install a CM flatbed on a 2017 F250. When I went to pick it up the tool box was welded too close to the back tire. He looked at it and sent it back to the welder and got the problem resolved. I appreciated him standing behind his work and making it right.

name: Teri Bodner
text: Just brought new Ford F-150 at Sandy Sangsing 4/10/2020. Had a spray in bed liner done the day before our purchase. Commercial Van Specialists did the most amazing job on our bed liner. It is perfect! Thank you so much for the great job!! 💕💕

name: Jimmy Benson
text: I've taken multiple 1500 and 2500 vehicles to these guys and they've always done a great job.  I trust them with all of my trucks.  The finished product has always exceeded my expectations.

name: James Mcbride
text: Good job and pricing is acceptable

name: Lisa Davison
text: Aired up my car tires, very nice to assist me. Trucks are their business.  No charge. Very kind people. Thank you!

name: Foxcrete Construction
text: We have brought both our new fleet vehicles in for various work. Both times they were fast, and did exactly what they said they would.  I am completely impressed with the spray in bed liner, it looks like it came from factory. They took the time to take every bolt and trim off to insure and clean job. Thanks guys, we will be back!

name: Corey York
text: A excellent place to do business. Troy and his staff are superb and efficient. I had an appointment at 730AM to spray my bed inside my truck I arrived and they jumped on it right away. The finished product was marvelous, if you ever need accessories or a spray in bedliner for your truck this is the place to go.  Five stars is not enough!

name: Sher's Cars
text: Troy makes things happen. Does everything on time and works with our crazy schedule. When we need something done fast, he does it even if he is busy with other things. Bedliners are done the right way and there is nothing to complain about.

name: Matthew McArthur
text: Great place to go for commercial truck and van equipment. Troy has plenty of experience and keeps a top notch staff.

name: Archduke Bacon Von Cheeseburger
text: Got a Bed liner sprayed in and the bed liner looks great, but the Scratches and chips and gouges in my paint job do not. Update (3-19-18) - When I picked up the truck from commercial van it was very dirty and there were little pieces of bed-liner plastic stuck all over the truck. It looked like over-spray, but they came off when I wiped them, thinking that this wouldn't be a problem I took the truck home (that was my big mistake). I didn't notice the paint chips until after I went home and washed all the little pieces of over-spray plastic off. There are 2 chips next to the drivers side Z71 emblem a gouge in the clear coat right above the drivers side tail light and 2 large chips in the clear coat between the bed and cab on the passengers side. All of these are in the immediate area around where they were working.  I also found a scuff where something rubbery with grit on it was dragged across my passenger rear door and had to use buffing compound to get it off. If you have work done there you need to stay and watch them, because as with any auto shop damage done will never be "their" fault.  Troy the owner called me this morning and asked if I was the one that wrote the bad review of his business. When I told him yes I wrote it he said that review is unnecessary and that I had planned to scam him from the start. When I got tired of listening to his accusations I hung up on him. He then calls me back and leaves a message telling me I was extremely unprofessional and I was no longer welcome at his business. As the owner of a business that relies on good experiences with customers it is HIS job to be the professional. And the professional thing to do would have been to ask me to bring it back so they could look at the damage instead of accusing me of being a scammer. All I was going to ask for was some touch up paint so I could fix it myself, but all I got was hostility and accusations. My father is going to get a bed-liner done on his truck, but he will not be using Commercial Van Specialists in Loxley. Troy and his "business" will never get another dime of my money, nor will they get any business from any of my family and friends.  When I give someone money to work on my vehicle I expect them to treat it and me with respect, but these people fall terribly terribly short.

name: Chad Breaux
text: These guys do an excellent job!  Glad I found them.

name: Kris Warn
text: these guys are great! all of our commercial truck & personal truck needs will be taken care of here, they do what they say and make it happen.

name: John Spencer
text: Very good service and selection. Installer was very professional.

name: Dianne Bohannan
text: Helpful staff. We always go here for our vehicles

name: Eric Matzdorf
text: Nice to find a business that does great work and is good on their word!

name: Krista Presnall
text: They are professional and made the transaction fir bulky bar as easy as could be

name: Saul Gonzalez
text: Great place to buy a flat bed.

name: Mike Doane
text: Best ever, always on top of it.

name: Daniella Pedraza
text: Great service

name: Lance Cabaniss
text: Jam up

name: Richard Fernandez
text: My first experience with STO and they were the most helpful and friendly local business I have dealt with in a long time. They ordered my tonneau cover, called me when it came in, and even installed it too. I recommend STO and will definitely bring  my business back, thanks!

name: Timothy Beasley
text: Couldn't be happier with the customer service and the job these guys did.  My 1st experience using them but it reminded me of what old fashion customer service should be like. Customer for life as for as I'm concerned. Thanks a ton!!!

name: GARY DOSS
text: Purchase a Bed cover for my truck and a bug guard . Very good service and install . Very little wait time ...they did a great job .Very satisfied .

name: Joe F. Watson
text: Great place for truck accessories. Very accommodating.

name: Jeremy Simpson
text: Great knowledgeable staff.  Had them install a turn over plate several months back and because of their professionalism I drove all the way From PCB to have them out on my mud flaps and side steps! I’ll be back for a grille guard for sure! Would love for them to put a shop in in PCB.... not sure I’ll stay married because I’ll be broke!😂

resp.text: LOL, it was great working with you.

name: Roy Woods
text:
Friendly, professional service offering great truck upgrade products at substantially lower prices than other known locations. Superb customer service by Danny, John, Cody, Don and technical team!!
Highly recommend!!

name: Frankie Clark
text: Great company. I recently was looking for WeatherTech floor liners, and online they have an $18 shipping fee. I decided instead to look around for them. I went to Southern Truck Outfitters and they ordered the floor liners and they came in the next day and allowed me to see how they fit in my truck before having to pay. I ended up paying less there than I would have online for the same product plus the bonus safety of getting the product through an in-person location.

name: peanut Smith
text: I highly recommend you stop by and check them out the dude at the counter went out of his way to help me

name: Jeepsalive1 katz
text: Good prices and great workmanship!!  If everywhere was like this.. the world would be a better place!!

name: Brandi Fulton
text: If I could give them a negative 5 I would. I bought a $40000 Jeep. Took it to them to put a lift kit on it. The bolts on the shocks can’t loose. Took it back and they fixed it. Turned around and bought front and back bumper. On my way home the spare tire swing open almost hitting the side of my Jeep. I have taken my Jeep back 3 times to get the rear bumper fixed and it is still messed up.

resp.text: Hi Brandi, I'm sry that this has happened, we try I best to work with and accommodate all our customers needs to the best of our abilities. I hope to work with again in the future.

name: Tim Sowell
text: Cody and the guys do an amazing job.

name: G Knox
text: Daniel and his staff are very professional, polite and they things about truck accessories and the workmanship is awesome too.

resp.text: We appreciate it!

name: Derek Kilgore
text: Whether it be from Spray in liners to custom electrical wiring....they can do it! Go see Chris or Daniel!!

name: Greg Cone
text: The guys here are great! Definitely would recommend.

name: Schlep H
text: Super nice, knowledgeable staff

name: Charles Brunner
text: Went to drop off one of our work vehicles to get a brush guard put on. They already had it there and were waiting on us. When we arrived, they took care of us right away, no wait. Their out the door price with install was cheaper than anyone else for just the brush guard by itself...Ranch Hand! While I was there, I asked if they had vent visors for my personal truck. Not only did they beat Amazon's price but had them in stock right then! I will definitely be back, excellent customer service without trying to oversell or push products on you!

resp.text: Thank you so much it was great working with you. I hope to see you agian

text: Found truck bed mat cheaper than online prices!

resp.text: Thank you so much for working with us

name: Blessed Nomad

text: Fast friendly service

name: Dewayne Kennedy
text: Best place in Dothan to get a bed liner.  I recommend them to every truck customer I have.  They have put in several for me over the past 4 years and I have never had a customer complain about the Linex product.

resp.text: We enjoy you sending us customers. Thank you for the support

name: ron montefusco
text: Never really understood what truck outfitting is. That is, until I bought an old used pickup. There's things you need to do to it to tailor it to your uses, that's where these fine people come in. I've added a bed mat, a tonneau cover and step bars. Put them on one at a time, as I realized what I needed. I was treated as if I come in with a new Ford F-350 even though it was just an old Titan. Thanks guys, my truck fits my needs now! Would recommend this organization to everybody!

name: Captain Stehle
text: They do very professional work here.  The staff is knowledgeable and friendly.  Price are consistent unlike some places you will visit.  They treat women just as fairly as men which also unlike some other places in the auto industry.  There linex service is unmatched.  They are slightly higher on prices, but for the quality of workmanship and service it is worth a few extra dollars.  They stand behind there work 100%.

name: James Wyatt
text: Poor craftsmanship and they don't stand behind their work. Multiple issues at both the Dothan and Enterprise locations. Don't plan to go back.

name: Gary Mcallister
text: Reasonable prices. Friendly staff

resp.text: And you are great too

text: Great guys and service.

name: Mikael Ash
text: Daniel and his team don't just make a truck yours because you pay them...but because they get it and love trucks

name: Sherri Lynn
text: Although they weren't able to solve my problem, they were very helpful and whenever I purchase another truck they will definitely have my business.

resp.text: We always try to help

name: ACPtv
text: Great place to unload nice people, overnight parking on secluded street behind property no one bothers you at all, unloading truck bodies at 7AM on street usually, very seldom you have to pull on to yard.

name: dustin dowie
text: Great customer service and a competitively priced, better product. They got me in when they said they would and only took a few hours to finish. As far as the final result, all I can say is it looks better than any liner I've ever seen. If you're on the fence about this, go get it.

name: Clifton Bal
text:
No issues in and out
Friendly folks

name: Mixon Till
text: Shane and the guys at Line-X of Mobile exceeded any expectations I could have had for my Jeep! Insane value and you can trust them to do the job well, efficient and to always be available if you need anything after your purchase! Couldn't be more pleased.

text:
Best place to get everything you need ,
Ask for Shane he's the best

name: Brenda Barnette

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words. We appreciate you .

name: Mike Lowery (challenges)
text: I'm the VP for the Buckhorn High School football quarterback club and we had a flat tire on our equipment trailor that we had brought to our game versus Cullman High School.  The staff at Cullman High referred us to Branham.  They stayed open late to replace our tire so we could make it back to Huntsville.  They are wonderful people that care about their community and will go above and beyond to provide exceptional customer service! I would recommend Branham for any automotive needs you may have.  Branham needs to open a store in Huntsville!

resp.text: Glad we could help. Thank you for the kind words. We wish your team the best this season .

name: Jennifer Merriman
text: Very helpful! Saved my life!

resp.text: Thank you ! So glad we could help.

name: David Talmage
text: I took my 2017 Suburban in for an electrical issue, and I am so glad to say this shop restores my faith in humanity. First they were too busy to really dig into my problem, but a super nice mechanic, Phillip, spent a fair amount of time narrowing down the problem and advising me that he didn’t want to charge me for unnecessary repairs. He further advised that he believed a Chevy dealership would need to look into it, as it I was probably computer related. This is how a business should operate. They have won my business forever and I recommend them to anyone reading this. Bravo! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you David for trusting in us to take care of you and your vehicle needs. We appreciate you !

name: Rene Ingram
text:
I had Line-X sprayed in my husband's new truck at Branhams. Absolutely love it! I like that they take time with their customers, make sure they understand what's going on and what  is involved. They were very nice, welcoming and very friendly .
I would recommend them to anyone who is interested in the Line x.

resp.text: Thank you Rene. It was our pleasure. We hope that he enjoys his Line-x spray.

name: Jonathan Humphrey
text: Was a salesmanger in a retail store that does close to the same thing so i get the cant plz everbody an mistakes happen its how its resolved.The amount of miscomunication an important questions not asked is it lack of training or dont care if you ever return.

name: Paige M
text: While traveling from Nashville I had a flat tire on the interstate. No one would touch the truck because I have 37 inch tires on it. We were helped right away and back on the road in no time. Would highly recommend for anything you need! Best customer service around.

resp.text: Thank you Paige for the kind words. Glad we were able to help you out with flat tire. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Ryan Thornton
text:
Just wanted to say thanks to all at Branham and share my personal experience. You guys did an awesome job on the truck. I highly recommend giving them an opportunity for any of your automotive needs. It’s important to me to know that the actual owner of the business is present most all the time. I could tell he cared about my project just as much as I did. Him and his crew worked very hard to get the truck done and delivered as promised. For that I’m grateful. The staff there is very knowledgeable and helpful. The installer was very thorough and explained everything that he had done to the truck. Again l, can’t thank you all enough for the great service you always provide!
Ryan

resp.text: Thank you Ryan for trusting in us. We appreciate you . Hope to see you again soon.

name: Jerry Woods
text: The place was good to shop and to help

resp.text: Thanks for the business

name: Kamron Kimbrough
text: They’ve done great work at very good prices for me! Tinted windows, level kit, Tonneau cover and spray in bedliner is next! Chris is great to work with. Thanks

resp.text: Thanks Kamron . We appreciate you

name: Andy Collins
text: Great customer service and stands behind their work. We got our tires, wheels and had our Jeep lifted with Branhams Accessories. They have always done the servicing and upkeep. When I heard a squeak they diagnosed the problem and fixed it. Later I realized the part was faulty, the owner met me back at the business after hours, diagnosed the problem and kept it over night to get first thing the next morning. When they pulled the faulty part off, they realized it could have damaged my brake pads. They replaced them just to make sure . This is great customer service! Thanks for taking care of your customers and my Jeep!

resp.text: Thanks Andy we appreciate you and your business. You have a great looking Jeep.

name: Cody Adams
text: Great and friendly people and great service and work I wouldn’t take my truck anywhere else they do a great job and will treat you right

resp.text: Thanks Cody . Appreciate you

name: Zach Lee
text: Had a really great experience at Branham Tire and Accessories, they really took care of me with my new truck , they sprayed a Line-X bed liner, new set of tires and tinted my windows .. Now I’m ready to roll. Great customer service, clean shop and great prices.

resp.text: Thanks , hope you are enjoying your ride.

text: These guys are the very best and know their stuff.. if you need anything for your vehicle get with Chris and staff. They will treat you right..

resp.text: Thanks Rita for the review . We appreciate you very much .

text: Great service. I have always been overly satisfied with my service.  Chris is top notch.

resp.text: Thanks for trusting us to service your vehicle. Hope to see you soon .

name: Mark Wayne Alexander
text: Went with friend who is wheelchair bound. He needed to inquire about the possibility of having some kind of lift/pulley mounted in his truck to assist in getting his wheelchair into the back seat of his truck. Brenham was unable to help but shared some information with him about a company in Huntsville that could probably assist him with his need. Thought this was extremely nice of the people at Branham. So impressed that although I have not needed their services before will most definitely look to them in the future for my automotive needs.

resp.text: Glad we could be of service. Thank you very much for the kind words. We look forward to seeing you again

name: Alan Futvoye
text: Leveling kit installed my truck ( 2016 Nissan Titan XD Pro 4X) on Wednesday. Tires ordered and installed on Friday (Toyo Open Country R/T). Great job guys. Thanks Jamie for talking me out of my original thoughts. Love em.

resp.text: Thanks Alan for the kind words. Glad you are enjoying it! Hope to see you again soon.

text: These guys went above and beyond. Did some major repairs to my Jeep at an agreed on price. Then added further repairs and labor at no additional cost to me to make sure car was safe for many more miles. I have recently been buying accessories on line but going forward I will buy through Branham to support them any way I can.

resp.text: Thank you Jim . We appreciate you. Hope you enjoy your Jeep. .
